channel.title: Wtf why did jagex do this?
channel.description:
Why would they have these sword stances? Its the same thing for Godswords, and any 2h swords 2.
here it is in progress with a gs: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FoI5MxUMjxQ
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/server/1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/server/untitled.jpg[/img] This one my friend just emailed me [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/12.jpg[/img]

item.title: Wtf why did jagex do this?
item.dc:creator: @HellRain-T HellRain-T
item.description:
@HellRain-T wrote:

[quote=“zuppers, post:8, topic:340828”][quote author=HellRain-T link=topic=437214.msg3212819#msg3212819 date=1274409735]

[quote author=Frell link=topic=437214.msg3212818#msg3212818 date=1274409625]
First to pics means your computer cant handle a bunch of idle animations

The new pic is your friend in a free world with a gs.
[/quote]lol thats a members area, ill tell him to send me another to prove it
[/quote]You don’t seem to quite understand.[quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=437214.msg3212805#msg3212805 date=1274409121]
This stance has always been around - except you couldn’t view your own player doing it. The stance is triggered when a certain amount of players are in your area. Before, you could only see other players standing like that. Now with a few week old update, you can view your own character doing it.
[/quote]Also you may have your animation setting set to few.[/quote]What about this one? its in hd it cant be set to few:

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf why did jagex do this?

item.title: Wtf why did jagex do this?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

This stance has always been around - except you couldn’t view your own player doing it. The stance is triggered when a certain amount of players are in your area. Before, you could only see other players standing like that. Now with a few week old update, you can view your own character doing it.

Read full topic
